h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Tablet of the Three Supreme Location
content: The Tablet of the Three Supreme Curios item is located within The Webbed Hollow, specifically at the Temple of Yellow Flowers - Forest of Ferocity location. At this Shrine spot, you will fight Commander Beetle and upon defeating him, he will drop the Tablet of the Three Supreme.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tablet_of_the_Three_Supreme.md', within the main section titled 'Tablet of the Three Supreme', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Tablet of the Three Supreme Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Tablet of the Three Supreme Curios item is located within The Webbed Hollow, specifically at the Temple of Yellow Flowers - Forest of Ferocity location. At this Shrine spot, you will fight Commander Beetle and upon defeating him, he will drop the Tablet of the Three Supreme.
